channel.title: How can I get the N-Best list for single word pronunciation? – Politepix

item.title: How can I get the N-Best list for single word pronunciation?
item.dc:creator: mahes
item.description:
Hi all,
I have two questions to ask in this post.
1. what is the tool to use for generating the language model of more than 5000 words in the file.txt?
2. How to get the list of words with same pronunciation for the single word speech from the dictionary?Any specific Method is available in the openears library?

Thanks

Mahes

item.title: Reply To: How can I get the N-Best list for single word pronunciation?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Hi Mahes,

Check out the documentation for LanguageModelGenerator here:

/openears/yourapp#importantclasses

item.title: Reply To: How can I get the N-Best list for single word pronunciation?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: [edit] OpenEars has N-Best hypotheses and scoring since version 1.1.
